content:
The UT Clery Compliance has released their  Annual Security and Fire Safety Report available here PERIOD The report contains detailed information about emergency and crime reporting protocol and it also reports statistics regarding the number of crimes that occurred on and around campus from Jan PERIOD   to Dec PERIOD   PERIOD

The report outlined how to report a crime and discussed the resources that are available within the UTPD PERIOD It offered instructions on where to report emergency versus nonemergency situations and also listed statistics for the number of UT employees working to ensure students safety PERIOD The report also detailed other safety resources such as the Live Safe app the Office of Title IX the Dean of Students and more PERIOD The end of the report outlined definitions of specific crimes and gave information on how to go about reporting them PERIOD

In terms of crime statistics the crimes that occurred with the greatest frequency were liquor law violations that resulted in the perpetrator receiving disciplinary referral PERIOD  of these crimes took place with  being reported to law enforcement or another entity PERIOD The second most frequent crimes in  were drug law violations in which the perpetrators received disciplinary referral PERIOD  of these incidents occurred and  of them were reported to law enforcement or another entity PERIOD

There were no instances of manslaughter or murder and there were two instances of aggravated assault neither of which were reported PERIOD  instances of motor vehicle theft occurred but none were reported PERIOD Although  incidents of burglary occurred in  only  of them were reported meaning that twothirds of burglaries in  went unreported PERIOD Twothirds of incidents of fondling also went unreported the report indicates that  instances of fondling occurred in  but only five were reported to law enforcement or another entity PERIOD

Additionally  incidents of rape occurred in  and  of those incidents were reported PERIOD  instances of stalking occurred in  however only  of these crimes less than  were reported to law enforcement or another entity PERIOD There were  instances of domestic violence  of which were reported and three incidents of dating violence one of which was reported PERIOD

There were four total instances of illegal weapon possession one of these incidents lead to an arrest while the others resulted in disciplinary referral PERIOD

In comparison to the January  through December  statistics which are also included in this years report certain instances of crimes have decreased while others have increased PERIOD For example two fewer rapes occurred in  than  PERIOD  fewer instances of domestic violence occurred in  versus  PERIOD Aggravated assaults decreased by  PERIOD However stalking incidents increased by seven from  to  and dating violence incidents increased by three PERIOD

Additionally  more incidents of drug law violations resulting in disciplinary referral occurred in  PERIOD Motor vehicle thefts increased by  from  to  PERIOD

The fire report indicated that two fires occurred on campus in  one in Volunteer Hall and one in Hess Hall PERIOD Both fires began in a kitchen unintentionally PERIOD
